name: El Vecindario
description:
Try to escape from the city of Arcosa, avoid the creatures in the fog, fight with them, cause noise to distract them, you decide !.

The game is in Spanish but the level design guides  the player  through the 5 levels, this is a 2-3 hours duration game.

Donations will be used in El Vecindario chapter 2 who will be in Spanish and English.
